data.name: txtTongHopCongNoPhaiTra.EditValue
data.value:
DECLARE @TuNgay as datetime DECLARE @DenNgay as datetime
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
SELECT ID,ttcMa ,(TamUngDauKy -PhanBoDauKy -DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy)TamUngDauKy ,(XuatKhoDauKy-PhanBoDauKy-DaThuXuatKhoDauKy) ConPhaiThuDauKy ,(TamUngTrongKy -PhanBoTrongKy )TamUngTrongKyConLai ,XuatKhoTrongKy PhaiThuTrongKy ,(PhanBoTrongKy +DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy)DaThuTrongKy ,DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy HoanTamUngTrongKy ,(TamUngDauKy -PhanBoDauKy -DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy)+(TamUngTrongKy -PhanBoTrongKy )UngTruocCuoiKy ,(XuatKhoDauKy+XuatKhoTrongKy-PhanBoDauKy-PhanBoTrongKy-DaThuXuatKhoDauKy-DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy) ConPhaiThuCuoiKy FROM
(
SELECT ID, ttcMa,
/***** DAU KY *****/
-- tạm chi đầu kỳ --
--tong nha cung cap tam ung dau ky (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) TamUngDauKy, -- đã phân bổ nhập kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang=KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay -- SophieuDH in --((select PhieuTC0 from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id -- and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) --union all --(select PhieuTC0 from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id -- and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay)) )PhanBoDauKy, -- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy,
-- phải Chi Nhâp kho đầu kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) XuatKhoDauKy, -- đã CHI nhập kho (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoDauKy,
/***** TRONG KY *****/
-- tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as TamUngTrongKy, -- đã phân bổ nhập kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang=KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay -- SophieuDH in --((select PhieuTC0 from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id -- and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay -- and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) --union all --(select PhieuTC0 from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id -- and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @TuNgay -- and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @DenNgay)) )PhanBoTrongKy,
-- phải CHI nhập kho trong kỳ -- (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay )XuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã CHI nhập kho trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from CHI where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy,
-- đã chi hoàn tạm ứng trong kỳ (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) <= @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = KHACHHANG.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) <= @DenNgay) as DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy
FROM KHACHHANG
)TBL
WHERE
TamUngDauKy <> 0 or XuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or PhanBoDauKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoDauKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngDauKy <> 0 or TamUngTrongKy <> 0 or XuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaThuXuatKhoTrongKy <> 0 or DaChiHoanTamUngTrongKy <> 0 or PhanBoTrongKy <> 0
ORDER BY ttcMa

data.name: txtTongHopCongNoPhaiThu.EditValue
data.value:
DECLARE @TuNgay as datetime DECLARE @DenNgay as datetime
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
declare @NgayChot as datetime set @NgayChot = '01/08/2017'
DECLARE @tblKQ as table( ID int, ttcMa nvarchar(50), TamUngDauKy float, ConPhaiThuDauKy float, TamUngTrongKyConLai float, PhaiThuTrongKy float, DaThuTrongKy float, HoanTamUngTrongKy float, UngTruocCuoiKy float, ConPhaiThuCuoiKy float )
insert into @tblKQ(Id,ttcMa) SELECT Id,ttcMa FROM KHACHHANG
update tbl
set -- KH tạm ứng trước =Tổng Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) (đến thời điểm A) – Thu phân bổ (đến thời điểm A) – Hoàn tạm ứng (đến thời điểm A). TamUngDauKy = ( select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select TamUng from congnohethongdauky where idKH = tbl.id and TrangThai = 1),0) ,
-- Số phải thu ( tống tất cả các giá trị xuất kho) - Thu phân bổ – thu ngân hàng (Thu cho XK)– thu tiền mặt (Thu cho XK) ConPhaiThuDauKy = (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select ConThieu from congnohethongdauky where idKH = tbl.id and TrangThai = 1),0) ,
-- Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) – Thu phân bổ (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) TamUngTrongKyConLai = ( select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- Tổng giá trị các xuất kho (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) PhaiThuTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- Thu phân bổ + Thu tiền mặt (Thu cho XK) + Thu ngân hàng (Thu cho XK) (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) DaThuTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- phiếu chi có mục đích hoàn tạm ứng (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) HoanTamUngTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
from @tblKQ tbl
-- Xoa du lieu thua delete from @tblKQ where TamUngDauKy + ConPhaiThuDauKy + TamUngTrongKyConLai + PhaiThuTrongKy + DaThuTrongKy + HoanTamUngTrongKy = 0
-- CUOI KY ----------------- -- KH tạm ứng trước = Tổng Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) (đến thời điểm B) – Thu phân bổ (đến thời điểm B) – Hoàn tạm ứng (đến thời điểm B). update @tblKQ SET UngTruocCuoiKy = TamUngTrongKyConLai + TamUngDauKy - HoanTamUngTrongKy, ConPhaiThuCuoiKy = ConPhaiThuDauKy + PhaiThuTrongKy - DaThuTrongKy
select * from @tblKQ

data.name: txtChiTietCongNoPhaiThu.EditValue
data.value:
declare @TuNgay as datetime declare @DenNgay as datetime declare @IdKH as int
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
declare @NgayChot as datetime set @NgayChot = '01/08/2017'
set @IdKH = 20 * 1 * 1 * 1
declare @tblKetQua as table( SoPhieu nvarchar(30), TenVatTu nvarchar(1500), Ngay datetime, SoTT int, MaVatTu nvarchar(500), DonViTinh nvarchar(30), SoLuong float, DonGia float, TienHang float, TienThue float, TongTienTamUng float, ConLaiTamUng float, PhatSinhNo float, PhatSinhCo float, LuyKe float, HanThu datetime, LoaiCT nvarchar(50), SapXep int, Ngay2 datetime, SoPhieu2 nvarchar(30), SoCG nvarchar(30) )
-- thông tin đầu kỳ -----------------
declare @LuyKeDauKy as float declare @ConPhaiThuDauKy as float declare @UngTruocDauKy as float
set @ConPhaiThuDauKy = (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from phieuxuatkho where IdKhachHang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select ConThieu from congnohethongdauky where idKH = @IdKH and TrangThai = 1),0)
set @UngTruocDauKy = ( select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thu where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from thunh where MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from chi where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(Sotien),0) from unc where MucDich = 230 and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select TamUng from congnohethongdauky where idKH = @IdKH and TrangThai = 1),0)
set @LuyKeDauKy = @ConPhaiThuDauKy - @UngTruocDauKy
insert into @tblKetQua(TenVatTu,TongTienTamUng,PhatSinhNo,LuyKe) SELECT N' -- Đầu kỳ: ', @UngTruocDauKy, @ConPhaiThuDauKy, @LuyKeDauKy
-- Lấy thông tin thu tạm ứng -- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, TongTienTamUng, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'PT ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien, N'Tạm ứng TM',1,PhieuTC0 from THU WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, TongTienTamUng, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'NT ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien, N'Tạm ứng NH',2,PhieuTC0 from THUNH WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
-- Lấy thông tin tiền xuất kho ------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, Ngay, TenVatTu,DonViTinh,MaVatTu,SoLuong,DonGia,TienHang,SoTT,TienThue,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) SELECT 'XK ' + PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu, PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang, TENVATTU.ten AS TenVatTu, TENDONVITINH.TEN AS DonViTinh, VATTU.Model, XUATKHO.Soluong, XUATKHO.Dongia, (XUATKHO.Soluong * XUATKHO.Dongia)ThanhTien, XUATKHO.AZ AS Stt, (case when XUATKHO.Xuatthue = 1 then (SoLuong * DonGia) * (MucThue / 100.0) else 0 end)TienThue, N'Xuất kho',6,SophieuCG FROM XUATKHO LEFT OUTER JOIN VATTU LEFT OUTER JOIN TENDONVITINH ON VATTU.IDTenvattu = TENDONVITINH.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TENVATTU ON VATTU.IDTenvattu = TENVATTU.ID ON XUATKHO.IDvattu = VATTU.ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN PHIEUXUATKHO ON XUATKHO.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu where PHIEUXUATKHO.IdKhachHang = @IdKH AND Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,PHIEUXUATKHO.NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay
-- Lấy thông tin xuất kho công trình --- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, Ngay, TenVatTu,SoLuong,DonGia,TienHang,SoTT,TienThue,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'XK ' + PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieu,Ngaythang,NoiDung,SoLuong,DonGia, (XUATKHOAUX.Soluong * XUATKHOAUX.Dongia), -1,(case when XUATKHOAUX.Xuatthue = 1 then (SoLuong * DonGia) * (MucThue / 100.0) else 0 end), N'Xuất kho CT',7,SophieuCG FROM PHIEUXUATKHO INNER JOIN XUATKHOAUX ON XUATKHOAUX.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu WHERE PHIEUXUATKHO.IdKhachHang = @IdKH AND Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,PHIEUXUATKHO.NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay
-- Lấy tiền thu phân bổ ------------ insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG,TenVatTu) (select 'PB ' + SoPhieu,NgayThang,PhanBoTamUng,N'Phân bổ',3,SophieuCG, (select GiaiThich from DM_HINH_THUC_TT where id = (select IDHinhThucTT2 from bangchaogia where Sophieu = SophieuCG)) from phieuxuatkho where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and PhanBoTamUng <> 0 and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
-- Hoàn tạm ứng -------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhNo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) (select 'HTM ' + SoPhieu, NgayThangCT, Sotien,N'Hoàn tạm ứng TM',10, (SELECT SophieuCG from PHIEUXUATKHO WHERE SoPhieu = PhieuTC1) from chi where MucDich = 230 and IdKh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhNo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) (select 'HNH ' + SoPhieu, NgayThang, Sotien,N'Hoàn tạm ứng NH',11, (SELECT SophieuCG from PHIEUXUATKHO WHERE SoPhieu = PhieuTC1) from unc where MucDich = 230 and IdKh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
-- Thu xuất kho ------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhCo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'PT ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien, N'Thu xuất kho TM',8, (select SophieuCG from phieuxuatkho where sophieu = PhieuTC1) from THU WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhCo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'NT ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien, N'Thu xuất kho NH',9, (select SophieuCG from phieuxuatkho where sophieu = PhieuTC1) from THUNH WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 100 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
-- tạo phiếu xuất kho tổng bên cột phát sinh nợ ---------------------------------------------
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhNo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select SoPhieu,Ngay,SUM(TienHang+TienThue),N'Phiếu XK',4,SoCG from @tblKetQua where LoaiCT = N'Xuất kho' or LoaiCT = N'Xuất kho CT' group by SoPhieu,Ngay,SoCG
update @tblKetQua set Ngay2 = Ngay, SoPhieu2 = SoPhieu
update @tblKetQua set SoPhieu = SoTT, Ngay = null where LoaiCT = N'Xuất kho' or LoaiCT = N'Xuất kho CT'
-- trừ tạm ứng còn lại sau phiếu thu phân bổ ---------------------------------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(TenVatTu,LoaiCT,SapXep,Ngay2,SoPhieu2,SoTT,SoCG) select N'T.Ứ CG' + SoCG + N' còn lại' ,N'Tạm ứng còn lại',4,Ngay2,SoPhieu2,-1,SoCG from @tblKetQua where LoaiCT = N'Phân bổ'
select * from @tblKetQua order by Ngay2,SapXep,SoPhieu2,SoTT,LoaiCT
